title: Adalin 120ML Syp
formula:
Aminophylline, Ammonium Chloride containing Expectorants
Macter
details: It is used to prevent and treat wheezing, shortness of breath, and difficulty breathing caused by asthma, chronic bronchitis, emphysema, and other lung diseases.
precautions: Before taking this drug, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to active ingredient; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. If you are using the liquid form of this medication, carefully measure the dose using a special measuring device/spoon. Do not use a household spoon because you may not get the correct dose. Liquid forms of this product may contain sugar and/or alcohol. Caution is advised if you have diabetes, liver disease, or any other condition that requires you to limit/avoid these substances in your diet. Ask your doctor or pharmacist about using this product safely. Tell your doctor if your cough returns, or if it is accompanied by fever, severe sore throat, rash, persistent headache, or if it persists or worsens after 7 days. These may be signs of a serious medical problem. Seek immediate medical attention if you think you may have a serious medical problem.
effects: Nausea or vomiting may occur. If either of these effects persist or worsen, tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

title: Coldene 60ML Syp
details: It is used for the temporary relief of Fever, Stuffy nose, Sinus, and Ear symptoms caused by the Common cold, Flu, Allergies, Sinusitis, Bronchitis.
precautions: Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist of all prescription and nonprescription/herbal products you may use, especially of aliskiren, lithium, drugs that may increase the level of potassium in the blood (such as ACE inhibitors including benazepril/lisinopril, birth control pills containing drospirenone).
effects: Mild upset stomach, Trouble sleeping, Dizziness, Lightheadedness, Headache, Nervousness, Shaking, or Tachycardia may occur.

title: Siroline 120ML Syp
formula:
Theophylline and Ammonium Chloride containing Cough Expectorant
Mendoza
details:
Siroline syrup is 120ml syrup that is mainly used as a cough syrup. It is really beneficial for treating and preventing seasonal cough and sneezing. It as an active ingredient most commonly refer to as theophylline.

Siroline syrup belongs t

READ MORE
precautions: It is highly suggested always to tell your complete medical history to your doctor to avoid developing side effects. People are usually allergic to the inactive ingredients present in the cough syrups like siroline syrup; therefore never hesitate to share your medical background with your concerned physician.Siroline syrup may have some inactive ingredients that can trigger an allergic breakdown in people sensitive to medications like siroline. It is recommended to talk to your concerned pharmacist before consuming the siroline syrup in a daily basis.Do not lie about your medical background. It is highly suggested and always preferred by the doctors as a precaution to always tell your doctor if you have breathing problems, including chronic bronchitis, asthma, emphysema and smoker’s cough. There are high chances of developing fatal health diseases if siroline syrup is taken without instructions.Patients are suggested to tell their doctor if they have had an experienced cough with blood and troubled breathing before he prescribes you the siroline syrup. Siroline syrup has a small amount of sugar content in form of alcohol thus patients who have diabetes, liver diseases and any other medical condition that requires the person to avoid sugar content in the diet is suggested not to use siroline syrup.Doctors usually prescribe women use siroline syrup while their expecting to treat chronic coughs. However, it is not suited to all women during pregnancy. Therefore, do not use siroline syrup unless your doctorate you to use so.Siroline syrup contains guaifenesin that has a chance of passing into the breast milk while the mother is breastfeeding. Therefore, doctors always recommended women not to use siroline syrup while feeding a child to avoid fatal side effects.Moreover, this medication contains aspartame. If you have a medical condition, commonly known as phenylketonuria or PKU, you must not use siroline syrup to treat the cough since aspartame will trigger the effects of PKU.
effects: There are some serious side effects that people can observe due to siroline syrup if the dosage is not taken as per the instructions of the doctor. Some of the side effects observed are as follows:NauseaVomitingHeadacheSkin allergiesDizzinessTroubled breathingLoss of taste

title: Acefyl 90ML Syp
details:
Acefyl syrup is a 125ml cough syrup that is mainly used for the treatment of asthma, allergy and cough suppression. People suffering from bronchodilators and similar conditions use this cough syrup to prevent the cough from causing chronic condit

READ MORE
precautions: Acefyl syrup, when used efficiently, may not cause side effects. However, there are some situation under which the Acefyl cough syrup can proved out to be causing serious conditions. Such situations and related precautions are as follows:Taking expired Acefyl syrupUsing the Acefyl syrup after the expiry date may cause serious side effects and chronic illnesses. Expired Acefyl cough syrup does not treat the cough conditions; however, worsen them and becomes ineffective in eliminating and treating the effects of bronchitis conditions. Thus, it is always required to use a fresh supply of Acefyl syrup dose; otherwise, chronic allergies may emerge. Taking more than prescribed Acefyl syrup doseIt is always recommended to not use more than the prescribed dose of Acefyl syrup; otherwise, the symptoms may worsen, and the serious side effects are seen in people showing carelessness. Taking more than the prescribed dose of the cough syrup may cause poisoning, and thus it recommended to consult your primary physician before taking daily dosages to avoid chronic allergies and dizziness.Taking less than a prescribed dose or missing a dosageAnother precaution is to use the right and appropriate amount of Acefyl syrup as prescribed by your doctor and it is highly suggested to not miss out on the daily dose of Acefyl syrup. In case you missed it, immediately resume your schedule of dosing and consult your doctor if the new schedule is needed due to missing out on the daily dosages.Do not self-prescribe the doseIt is always recommended to not suggest such cough syrups like Acefyl to your peers without consulting the doctor. It may or may not suit people, and they may develop some serious health issues. Sometimes such self-prescriptions cause and may lead to over and under dosage too.It is always suggested by the doctors to store the Acefyl syrup at the room temperature, and the cough syrup must be kept way from direct heat and sunlight. Other precautionary measuresIt is always recommended to not place the Acefyl syrup in the freezer or at extremely cold temperatures unless your doctor asked you to do so. Another precautionary measure is to keep the Acefyl syrup away from the reach of children. Mover, you are also required to not drain or flush such medications as they are potent of causing the contamination in the environment, and this may cause serious fatal allergies. It is highly suggested as part of precautions to not give the Acefyl syrup to children under the age of 6 years since the drugs in it may cause allergies in children.
effects: Low blood pressure, headache, shivering, dizziness, sleepiness, nausea, and vomiting are some of the main side effects caused by Acefyl cough syrup. Besides these conditions, people have also experienced some serious skin allergies that may cause thing and rashes, along with troubled breathing are Acefylsyrup is not taken as prescribed by the doctor.

So that doctor can recommend it according to it.The patient which are hypersensitive should avoid using this tablet as it contains an inactive ingredient which may result in serious allergic problems.Consult a doctor first if the patient is having Purulent sputum, fever, and dyspnea. It can be very risky for them if they use it without any consultation.The patient should be cautioned if they are suffering from cough with a lot of mucus, asthma, chronic cough, smoking, glaucoma (a certain eye condition), and having urinating problemsThe patient should avoid using any heavy machinery or drive a car as it can be very risky for them; this medication may cause dizziness or drowsiness.
effects: Every medicine has its benefits and side effects too. Some of the side effects are rare, but some are very serious. precautions: Before using this medication, it is very important to consult a doctor first and share medical history or the current health situation of the patient. So that doctor can recommend it according to it.Patients which are hypersensitive should avoid using this tablet as it contains an inactive ingredient which may result in serious allergic problems.The patient should avoid using any heavy machinery or drive a car as it can be very risky for them; this medication may cause dizziness or drowsiness.The medicine should not be given to Hypertensive Patients, Cardiac patients, and to Pregnant Mothers.Infants age of 2 years can use the drug only if it is recommended in case of any serious problem or under medical attention.In pregnancyThe pregnant women should use this Syrup if needed; they should first consult a doctor then use it. So that the baby doesnat get any harm.
effects: Every medicine has its benefits and side effects too. Some of the side effects are rare, but some are very serious. It is not necessary that side effects occur every time, but they may occur.Some of the side effects which may occur are theDizzinessNauseaAnorexiaThirstDryness of mouthSomnolenceSome of the serious problems that might occur arefeversevere sore throatserious allergiesrashpersistent headacheitching or swelling (especially of the throat, face, or tongue)severe dizzinessImmediately consult a doctor if the condition of the patient gets worse or unstable.

title: Coldene Tab 10x10 (L)
details: It is used for the temporary relief of Fever, Stuffy nose, Sinus, and Ear symptoms caused by the Common cold, Flu, Allergies, Sinusitis, Bronchitis.
precautions: Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist of all prescription and nonprescription/herbal products you may use, especially of aliskiren, lithium, drugs that may increase the level of potassium in the blood (such as ACE inhibitors including benazepril/lisinopril, birth control pills containing drospirenone).
effects: Mild upset stomach, Trouble sleeping, Dizziness, Lightheadedness, Headache, Nervousness, Shaking, or Tachycardia may occur.

title: Prospan 120ML Syp
details:
Prospan syrup is cough syrup. The main ingredient of this syrup is ivy leaf. It is a herbal medicinal product made in traditional ways. It provides instant relief from the cough caused by the common cold.

Uses
Prospan is a herb
READ MORE
precautions: Inform the doctor or health practitioner, your complete medical history before taking medicine.Read the prescription page carefully to understand the medicine completely.It is a sugar-free syrup and is considered safe for diabetic patients.Do not take medicine if you are allergic to any of its ingredients.Expectant mothers must consult the doctor before taking medicine.Breastfeeding mothers should also avoid taking medicine without doctor's consultation.Keep it away from children’s reach.Keep the medicine away from sunlight and moisture.
effects: Like every other medicine, prospan syrup also has some side effects; but not everyone is affected. The medicine works fine on the majority of individuals. Some of the possible side effects of prospan syrup are as follows:Common Side-EffectsSome individuals experience common side-effects of this medicine during medicine’s adjustment period. These go on their own after 1 or 2 days, but if the condition persists or worsens seek medical assistance immediately. Some of the common side-effects of this medicine are as follows:NauseaVomitingLoose MotionMild HeadacheRare side-EffectsRare side effects of the medicine are experienced if a person is allergic to any of the ingredients present in the medicine or due to any other ailment or medication. These are dangerous and can cause death. Allergies on the face or any other parts of the bodySkin rashesRedness and ItchinessSwelling of Face or FeetDyspnoea or shortness of breathGastrointestinal RefluxIt contains sorbitol which may cause diarrhoea in some individuals.Above listed side-effects are the prevalent ones. You may feel any other side-effect of the medicine. Contact your doctor immediately if you feel any serious distress after taking medicine.
